biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Marcia Nicole Barandshay (born 19 May 1971 in Biel/Bienne, Switzerland) is an Dutch-German actress, singer, songwriter, anti death penalty advocate and Screenwriter.
